Mamdani and Trump won the same 139 election districts.

 

The U.S. president threatened to take control of New York City if the

democratic socialist mayoral nominee is elected this November.

Both won 30% of the same districts.

 

Neighborhood: Downtown Flushings

Both Trump and Mamdani won this Queen’s

neighborhood by a short margin, a majority

Asian population.

Neighborhood: Borough Park

A predominantly Jewish neighborhood,

Mamdani and Trump won eight election

districts partially located here.

BRONX

MANHATTAN

Neighborhood: Pleasent Plains

Mamdani won Trump-leaning

neighborhoods like Pleasent Plains,

along with Hillside and College Point

in Queens and Bath Beach in

South Brooklyn.

STATEN

Mamdani and Trump won the same 139 election districts.

 

The U.S. president threatened to take control of New York City if the

democratic socialist mayoral nominee is elected this November.

Both won 30% of the same districts.

 

Neighborhood: Downtown Flushings

Both Trump and Mamdani won this Queen’s neighborhood

by a short margin. A majority Asian population, locals

at Flushing said their votes for both opposing

candidates were driven by economic concerns, according

to The Gothamist.

BRONX

Neighborhood: Borough Park

A predominantly Jewish neighborhood,

Mamdani and Trump won eight election

districts partially located here.

neighborhoods like Pleasent Plains,

along with Hillside and College Point

in Queens and Bath Beach in

South Brooklyn.
